mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_daily_task_log (openid, type, points, status, review_content) VALUES (#{openid}, #{type}, #{points}, #{status}, #{reviewContent})
mapper.delete: delete from user_daily_task_log where created_at <= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 90 DAY)
mapper.select: SELECT type, COUNT(*) as count FROM user_daily_task_log WHERE openid = #{openid} AND DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') and type in('ad','daily') GROUP BY type
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(points), 0) FROM user_daily_task_log WHERE openid = #{openid} AND (status = 'completed' OR status = 'approved')

SELECT id, openid, type, points, created_at, status, review_content, remark FROM user_daily_task_log WHERE openid = #{openid} AND type in("ad","daily") AND DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT t1.id, openid, t1.type, t1.points, t1.created_at, t1.status, t1.review_content, t1.remark FROM user_daily_task_log as t1,task_config as t2 WHERE openid = #{openid} AND (t2.type = 'limited_time' AND t2.start_time <= NOW() AND t2.end_time >= NOW()) AND t1.type = t2.task_key ORDER BY created_at DESC
